entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
